TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A type of lymphoma that grows and spreads quickly and has severe symptoms. Also called aggressive lymphoma and high-grade lymphoma.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "linfoma de grado intermedio"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Tipo de linfoma que crece y se disemina rápidamente y que presenta síntomas graves. También se llama linfoma de crecimiento rápido y linfoma de grado alto.
